ygData.subject: Re: Banded armor and looks
ygData.msgSnippet: The cloak of leaves is on an npc in south kerana i believe, although I don t know who/.... Arathorne, Solsek Ro ...
ygData.messageBody:
The cloak of leaves is on an npc in south kerana i believe, although I don't
know who/....

Arathorne, Solsek Ro
